briefTitle: Evaluation of Brimonidine Tartrate/Ketotifen Fumarate Combination in Adults With Seasonal Allergic Conjunctivitis
officialTitle: Evaluation of the Combination Drug Product Brimonidine Tartrate 0.025%/Ketotifen Fumarate 0.035% Ophthalmic Solution Compared to Its Components and Vehicle in an Allergen BioCubeÂ® in Subjects With Seasonal Allergic Conjunctivitis

interventions.name: Brimonidine Tartrate 0.025%/ Ketotifen Fumarate 0.035% Ophthalmic Solution

arms.label: Brimonidine Tartrate 0.025%/ Ketotifen Fumarate 0.035% Ophthalmic Solution

summary: To evaluate the efficacy of Combo compared to its individual components and compared to vehicle in a population of subjects with seasonal allergic conjunctivitis.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Assessed up to 480 minutes post-instillation of assigned IP

effectByArm.arm: Brimonidine Tartrate 0.025%/ Ketotifen Fumarate 0.035% Ophthalmic Solution
